subject: Re: Another wierd one [1 Attachment]
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Oh, I guess if there was volcanix ash you'd want to stay covered up, like they said. The Ol' Lady poo poos all this stuff, but I did put a jug of water away--justincase.

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Well, I'm sure you guys know already that there is a comet, ElLninne sp, 
> and also an astrode, and not to mention some planet x that some think is 
> hiding behind the sun?  These are going around our planet orbit now, the comet is 
> moving very close to earth on the 21st of this month, May, and again in 
> Sept. And nov. every time it does this we had earth quakes, that were those big 
> ones.  Only two days ago, hundreds of dead animals were found in 
> Yellowstone Park, and look at the thousand of animals and fish all over the world 
> dead, this is a wild year.  Something is defiantly going on, and it's nothing 
> that is good. sf
>
